songs.title: Lord of Blessed Murder
songs.lyrics:
Lord of blessed murder

The virgin soil blackened by the blood of Abel
Oh fire crowned Cain
The guardian of the emerald flame
He who travels freely in
In the shadow of the mighty dead
He who dwells in the bowels of black earth
King of all cemeteries
Unbound is your imperishable spirit
Transcending all finite limitations
Your enlightenment ends the illusion of life
Master of the kingdom of bones
Your burial mounds have blossomed
The sweet fruits of death
Hail the blessed and cursed dead

songs.title: Eschaton
songs.lyrics:
Larvae!

Guides this mortal form
To divinity! Nucleus has began diminishing
In entropy
Through me twilight's gleaming
Cell by cell poisoning
Everything left
We are as one
The beast that never sleeps
Gloria letum exegesis
A passage to chaos
The void that ends lights voyage
Gloria letum in excelsis
Through me the beckoning wail commences
Gloria letum in excelsis
I have become
All life final breath
The moment that ends all moments
In ecstasy return in to his vastness.

songs.title: Omega Serpent
songs.lyrics:
The serpent monarch

Encircled by flame
The fires of life subdued
To extinguish
Insipid and immeasurable empty kismet
Born to be disjointed
Broken Ouroboros!
The astral light has traveled to its precipice
An infinity to reach an end
No longer eclipsed by matter
Make silent the cosmic pulse
Hidden knowledge has countless voices
The cosmos crumbles as they speak
Tearing tail from tongue and tooth
Omega serpent

songs.title: Divine Providence
songs.lyrics:
I am the black radiance

The space between the nothing and remains,
A cancer speaking unto itself,
Is the nothingness I became
And mastered alone
Speak through me oh Lord
Summoned by death
To the nothingness life restrained
Unanswered
The only deity to show it face
And I answered alone.
Now speak through me oh Lord
Time release me
And I release you
With self removed
Into me, he grew
Awaiting
Time release me and I release death
Unto you all
And through me a god spoke.

songs.title: Prophetic Death Trance
songs.lyrics:
Burning the nights fatal thoughts

Lust for death within maddening anguish.
Waves of bitter agony
Premonitions of an end
Verses sung in vain
Verses heard by none!
The end of all life
The end of all being
Deteriorate to see nothing!

songs.title: Ephemerality of the Flesh
songs.lyrics:
Brightest light of day

Darkest night of madness
I began with nihility
Abundance that seeks union with emptiness
Nothingness and profusion
Infinity spiraling
Omission recoiling
The life be gone
To where no life began
And shall never be
The life be damned
To where no consciousness expands
Warmth escaping the blood
And the blood escapes
This feeble shell
From impurity
Disciple of diminishing gods

songs.title: Omnipresence
songs.lyrics:
Shining one, the adversary

Self-manifesting forbidden light!
Revealer of hidden virtues
Defiler of the divine deception!
Neither matter nor spirit
No desire, thought, word or action
Without form, without resemblance
The nameless being
Illusions emanate from within
Life and death wrapped within as vessels.
Drifting in encompassing emptiness for eternity
So above, so below and
Within the primordial cosmic realms
Fertilizing the wretched womb of creation
The boundaries of vision become clear
The limitations of time disappear

songs.title: High Price
songs.lyrics:
Sever the ties or everyone dies I stand before you ready to disembowel all
your lies cry your eyes all but dry leave them hanging High waiting for
all the Flies bleed them dry thy sacrifice leave them hanging High as
their price I cried for those who had to die
And then I remember you held your ties

songs.title: No Debate
songs.lyrics:
I cannot take this anymore
Every time I think of it I wanna drop you to the floor all this time and
then I swore you and I are going to war
then I swore you and I are going to war
Brought into a world only to suffer I'm just protecting my brothers one
thing will lead to another I watch your bodies until they burn no longer
you fucking piece of shit what the fuck did you think would happen when
you abandon what you created I'm so fucking full of rage and spite because
you think you can debate it
Go ahead try to run and hide soon enough I'll be saying goodbye I know
this eat you up inside you're barely breathing while I'm still alive

songs.title: Raw Neck
songs.lyrics:
You've only come back to see I was left in shambles and your mouth all it
does is ramble I'll put an end to it I'll make you eat your tongue do you
hear me you will feel what was done when I was young you wanna talk about
being special but you don't understand you are a mental treat everyday
like your bones brittle break your soul like you did me I was so little
Gone so long and you never saved yourself let me feel the pain I swear you
look like someone else cut the BS you know this is over now
I'm always prepared what are you now?
Weak. Spineless. Coward. Trying to get back in my life by asking for
financial gain I can't even take care of myself what do you mean
I'll put an end to it all your breathing drags to a crawl the noose around
your neck like the grip of death has rubbed you raw silence forever

The Hounds

Let them fucking eat

Lay down stones in a perfect circle.

It's where I hide the secrets I know

I'm alone, with my mind

I'm alone, in my sanity
With my shadows and me

So, you stumbled into greed

I'm falling down

I'm falling
And I'm running to you
I'm falling down
And I run
And I run
And I run

songs.lyrics:
I'll take you with me when its time to go fly

In a system far away
Dance with stars all night and all day

Gigantic nebulae are chanting goodbye.

In a system far away

There is a book of secrets hiding away

songs.title: Monuments To Ruins
songs.lyrics:
Cry for the children who die
For the ones who hang below the bridge

Hate, and don't you hesitate

And kill for their mandate

We are the ones who watch
We write in every law
We bring the hammer down
And crush you big or small

Bow, for the end is now
For your eyes have swollen shut and killed your life
So long you live in doubt
Crawl to the terrible fall
When your reasons give away to torture you
There's nothing left at all

We are the final wall
We pinpoint all your flaws
We break the hourglass
And cut you with the shards

Some people say the end of time
Others have seen and just deny

Cry for the children who die
For their sacrifice in this earthly vice
Red for the blood they shed
For their holy beds
Cause they're living dead
Because they're living dead

We are the ones who watch
We write in every law
We bring the hammer down
And crush you big or small
We are the final wall
We pinpoint all your flaws

songs.title: Frozen Sun
songs.lyrics:
The shelter has given dawn to light
Wind walker has taken the after sight

Aloof in the snow on a cloudy day
Lost in the woods and there's nothing left to say
A spirit is seen in the frozen sun
Human condition has become undone

Away with the mind of an acid child
Reveal the secrets of atlantian age
A journey is taken through the arcane sea
The medicine man hands the key

A prince of earth choice dealt a pawn
His father's blood must spill beyond
To salvage a race for a greater good
A throne usurped by the blades black hood

Release the guillotine and face the frozen sun
The gods have passed decree to let the souls live on

The hand of fate unmoved by deed
A god of judgment less appeased
The tide of earth brings the greater doom
A civilized age an ocean tomb

The shelter has given dawn to light
Wind walker has taken the after sight

Sacred, wicked, godless victim

Sacred liar, troubles dire
Shoot your way to high
Dead black flowers, all that cowers

We walk amongst this crowd
With one foot in the grave
We talk amongst this crowd
And miracles would save
And if you cared to listen
You'd that we were slaves
The blind, the blind

We desolate our veins
With pleasure in our cage
We kill the light inside
And replace it with rage
The blind, the blind

songs.lyrics:
Malevolent incubus born unto forgo its name
Sword in mouth rips apart nations who conquest to gain
Killing the media turns screws to twist tongue its tales

Rebuilt the Babylon forged upon ashes of flesh

Do you care to death defy

If we never could

And if we couldn't be
Un-live our reality

And if you follow me
We'll do things that set us free
And if the storm has grown

Look at me somber now I'm lost in my space

songs.lyrics:
Mother of tears torn down, death betrays

We lived a life full to the last breath

Our ways of living had led to the tomb

The fall of myself has appeased other wounds

Oh how I prayed for you my wayward bastard son
Edge of life the reaper's done
And if I say to you I miss your holy soul
Death the dealer digs your hole

Mother of tears torn down death betrays

Too young to die

Junkie

Whoa
Woe

songs.lyrics:
Unclean souls seek the divine

Won't you take away
This pain from a tattered life
Don't you heal and help us find

Faded memories have died
All that haunts us is alive
Walk us through the gates
And show us what to find
Living darkness we are blind

Lost our souls, seek the divine

Hands are tied upon the wheel
Beaten down we shall not kneel

Congregate, dominate, tied down tight, this is our time

Pleasure to enforce on you for all of the gold that you kept

Lost our souls, seek the divine

Voyager burns off the fuel

Dark are our days
Black are our nights

Driving our souls, our endless flight
All of us know that we could die

Voyager burns off fuel

Blood of revenge
This is the fighting,
The fighting of the gods
It's the clash of the titans

songs.title: Into The Fog
songs.lyrics:
And the fog goes down
And everything is hung up
And every eye is inflamed

And all the souls
Have opened in wait
And then everything goes fast

Like a run in a drop,
Like water in a fall,
Main instinct is the king
And the scent of the blood
Flies through the fog

The cries and the clash
Are lost in the mist
But not the death, not the death

The monsters and the men
Are vanishing in the mist
But not the death, not the death

Like a run in a drop,
Like water in a fall,
Main instinct is the king
And the scent of the blood
Flies through the fog

Then,
The wave of the battle goes away
Then,
The warriors become of ice,
Silence,
And thousands, amazed eyes,
Look,
Look to the red burning sky...

songs.title: Eyes Of Fire
songs.lyrics:
The Dragon wants
To use his eyes
Against Azrael

And Daeniel listens
Into his heart
His voice to speak

And the eyes
Change their essence,
Flesh and blood
In light and fire

Eyes, Eyes of Fire
Eyes of Fire
Eyes, Eyes of Fire
Eyes of Fire

And Daeniel takes
The dragon's eyes
Over his hands

And recites
The magic spell
Words from the past

And the eyes
Change their essence,
Flesh and blood
In light and fire

Eyes, Eyes of Fire
Eyes of Fire
Eyes, Eyes of Fire
Eyes of Fire

songs.title: The Fury
songs.lyrics:
The Dragon descends between the troops
And it reaps dead like wheat
Also the children of Azrael
Succumb to him...to him

A strong white light surrounds
The armies of Kaledon
And terrifies the undead
And the monsters...are blind

The Fury comes
Down from the sky... The light that destroys
The blind, the Fury of the sky
The light that burns

And Daeniel looks spellbound
So much power and majesty
And he sees the Dragon
For what it is... a sun

But the destiny is written
The Dragon is tired
The Ancient Enemy
Has hurt him...in deep

The Fury comes
Down from the sky... The light that destroys
The blind, the Fury of the sky
The light that burns

songs.title: New King Of Kaledon
songs.lyrics:
Hail, hail, hail to the king
Hail, hail, hail Daeniel
New king for the kingdom
New hope for the land

New era will start
New era will come
Daeniel the man, Daeniel the king

He is the lord of the Antillius' land
He is the son, he'll be the new king
With his heart and with his sword
He will defend your lives

Now I am your mighty king
And I'll love you like my children
Now my heart will be Yours
And you'll have a new great friend

New era will start
New era will come
Daeniel the man, Daeniel the king

He is the lord of the Antillius' land
He is the son, he'll be the new king
With his heart and with his sword
He will defend your lives

Scream, scream, scream his name
Win, win, win for the king
New friend for the people
New sword for the crown

New era will start
New era will come
Daeniel the man, Daeniel the king

He is the lord of the Antillius' land
He is the son, he'll be the new king
With his heart and with his sword
He will defend your lives

songs.title: The Prophecy
songs.lyrics:
Angels and Demons,
White and Black,
There is no good, without Evil,
And then, Daeniel the Great

What good is and what evil is ?
Only the ways of destiny...

But open eyes can see
A Great has risen to the Throne
A Great will rise from the depths of the ground
And great will be the battle...between the Great...
...between the Great......
...between the Great......

songs.title: Out Of The Ground
songs.lyrics:
When IT has fallen on the ground
It sunk down and down
Until to reach the center of the earth
And his heart has been torn away

Then here IT has been cared
And changed by an ancient force,
More than the Dragon, the White
More than Azrael, the Dark

Cry
In the sky of this world
Free out of the ground
As a star that rises from the low

This is the Great Essence
Of this World
She follows her desire
Of creation

And the gods have come here,
And the dragon,
And the man is awakened
And Mozul rises,

This is her gift to the world
So that from the darkness
The light gushes

Cry
In the sky of this world
Free out of the ground
As a star that rises from the low

Cry
In the sky of this world
Free out of the ground
As a star that rises from the low

songs.title: A New Man
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

'Till now you were a simple captain,
Now your rank will be more important.

I trust only in you,
I want you.
I trust only in you,
I want you.

From now you'll be the new leader.
The new lord of the armies.
Martin... Martin, you will be the new general of the troops.

You have now to work very hard.
You have to find new men for fighting.

I trust only in you,
I want you.
I trust only in you,
I want you.

From now you'll be the new leader.
The new lord of the armies.
Martin... Martin, you will be the new general of the troops.

Yes king Daeniel, I'll do my best.
Forces of evil will have a short life.

I trust only in you,
I want you.
I trust only in you,
I want you.

From now you'll be the new leader.
The new lord of the armies.
Martin... Martin, you will be the new general of the troops.

songs.title: Wounded Friend
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

A second, a little moment,
A small distraction was lethal.
A big lighting from the womb,
The green heart was wounded.

My heart is weak,
My wings are heavy.
I'm here my friend,
I'm here on earth.

During the fighting in the sky
The black God made his game.
For the troops everything was right,
But the black lord was unforeseeable.

My heart is weak,
My wings are heavy.
I'm here my friend,
I'm here on earth.

The wounded heart is still living,
Because his mission is not over.
Daeniel has to perceive about Mozul,
He has to explain how to win forever.

My heart is weak,
My wings are heavy.
I'm here my friend,
I'm here on earth.

songs.title: Mozul
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

My soldiers, my friends, beware!
Ancient enemy come back, it's unleashed.
"IT" remembers Azrael, was its father.
Now he's the new lord of the dark

Oh, Kaledon, Mozul comes to kill.... to kill
Oh, Kaledon, Mozul comes to lead the dark

His creator and his father are gone.
And your fury, great fury, is comin' out.
"IT" will find the reign of the light.
Now we must prepare to fight against the night.

Oh, Kaledon, Mozul comes to kill.... to kill
Oh, Kaledon, Mozul comes to lead the dark

songs.title: Undeads Again
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

The black valley of pain has moved
under the wings of the shadowlord.
Lightnings fall down from the red sky,
and hit the ground to create walkin' bones.

Undeads again,
You'll come again,
with the power of the Mozul's soul...
fighting!

The Valley of the Death returned to its darkness,
with the new lord, evil is back.
The only mission is to find the reign of Kaledon,
it's time to bury the land of goodness.

Undeads again
You'll come again,
with the power of the Mozul's soul...
fighting!

songs.title: The End Of The Green Power
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

The wind blows slowly,
A big silence in the air,
The end of the green
Power...

The suffering is strong,
the pain is a lot,
last breath was made,
everything is lost.

The eyes are now closed,
Forever you will sleep.
Your end is near,
Your end is here.

The Green mighty God is dead...
The Green wings are now closed...
We'll miss you,
We'll miss you,
We'll miss you,
We'll miss you,
the end of the green power...

Mighty dragon is wounded,
he has a wicked heart.
His love for us is awesome,
will be an eternal friend.

Our God is dead,
his soul will be with us.
Spirit of the dragon
will climb to the sky...

The Green mighty God is dead...
The Green wings are now closed...
We'll miss you,
We'll miss you,
We'll miss you,
We'll miss you,
the end of the green power...

songs.title: Flash In The Sky
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

Without warning the green body begins to raise up
high in the sky.
When it arrives to ten meters a green mighty light
illuminates the sky.

The light, the green light,
the green, the green mighty light...
High in the clouds,
High in the blue,
High in the sky!

The mighty body starts to crumble, becoming only
a light in the air.
Daeniel has been under the light, intensely fixing,
with fear in his eyes

The light, the green light,
the green, the green mighty light...
High in the clouds,
High in the blue,
High in the sky!

The light moves, turns on itself and immediately goes
in the body of the king!
Hurled away, Daeniel banged his head. He's now unconscious.
now he is a God!

The light, the green light,
the green, the green mighty light...
High in the clouds,
High in the blue,
High in the sky!

songs.title: Great Mighty Light
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

 [Instrumental]

songs.title: Greatest Heart
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

You are my choice,
you are the man who'll guide the reign.
They need a new God...
you will be the new God on earth.

My heart, the greatest heart.
My soul, now in a man.

Your loyalty
and your wisdom for the reign.
Your sword
will kill the enemy of Kaledon.

My heart, the greatest heart.
My soul, now in a man.

The only one,
the only one are you.
The dragon is the past,
now there is the man on earth

My heart, the greatest heart.
My soul, now in a man.

songs.title: The God Beyond The Man
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele - D.Fuligni - M.Palazzi]

I am a new man
I am the chosen one
My spirit is renewed
I am a new God

My blood now is green
My body is a covering
Covering for the force
...for the god

The power of the dragon now is in me
The power of the dragon is in my veins
I am the greatest lord of the reign
I am the god beyond the man

I have to tell this story
To the people of the land
They have to know the truth
About the king

The  troops are very tired
And they need a little rest
Now we'll start to go back
To the kingdom of the light

The power of the dragon now is in me
The power of the dragon is in my veins
I am the greatest lord of the reign
I am the god beyond the man

songs.title: Return To Kaledon
songs.lyrics:
[A.Mele]

A very long distance
between us and our reign,
we must return at home
to prepare the final war.

We have to learn to fight
against new creatures from the dark.
Mozul runs away,
enemies rise again.

Return to kaledon, return at home,
Return to the wisdom, return to light,
Return to the kingdom, return to our land.

Home,
Come back at home,
New war is near...
God,
New God with us,
New king as a guide...

Return to kaledon, return at home,
Return to the wisdom, return to light,
Return to the kingdom, return to our land.

Very soon on the way to home
the kingdom is so far.
We must prepare the soldiers
for the battle of the end.

The darkness falls again
with a new king and a new god,
Mozul has new powers
and the evil wants revenge.

Return to kaledon, return at home,
Return to the wisdom, return to light,
Return to the kingdom, return to our land.
